February 17, 2008, John reported directly to Mitch

Mitch is a rare find, his Project Management skills go beyond excellent client skills and task management.  Mitch is a true leader, he motivates people from diverse consulting teams to come together to accomplish goals which at times have seemed impossible.   Mitch provides clients with the knowledge that only through their success can he and his team be successful.  Mitch's deep experience and results driven style along with a nice dose of humor make him someone who quickly earns the respect of those working with him.  I would work for Mitch on any project doing any role he asked of me.

summary: Mitch Ivey is an advisory partner with PwC providing his clients with strategic advice in concert with sound tactical guidance for navigating through business and technology challenges.  Mitch has a proven track record of serving his clients to help them define and execute on tailored plans for the successful implementation of integrated finance, supply chain, customer management, revenue management, and billing solutions.  At PwC, Mitch has specific responsibility for providing leadership within the Finance and Revenue Innovation practices.  Always bringing a strategic perspective to everything he does, Mitch also serves as a leadership advisor and coach to executive teams to enable effective strategy formation and execution.
name: Mitch Ivey
title: Partner/Principal at PricewaterhouseCoopers
